reviewText:

Both films Look very nice, especially for being from early 1970s.  I totally recommend it.

After the end of the HD Format war between HD dvd and Blu Ray
I was wondering how long it would take for a studio to snatch up classic adult films and remaster them in HD and on the winning format (blu ray)
Anytime i brought this up on any film collector's board I'd get laughed at
Nobody understood why anyone would try or even care to dust off vintage adult films and remaster them in HD
I thought a major disturber like Hustler or Vivid would've done it..... Nothing for years
Sometime in 2015 Exploitation tv put this double feature out on BR
I have no clue how i missed this but, i was lucky enough to come across the page and was shocked that there was a blu ray
Two of director Bob Chinn's classic films
Scanned & restored in 2k from the 35mm camera negatives
Presented in Widescreen (1.85:1)  the disc is also Region free
The double disc features:
The Young Like it Hot (1983) starring: Hyapatia Lee and Kay Parker
& Sweet Young Foxes (1983)  starring: Hyapatia Lee and Kay Parker
Both films look flawless you'll never see either film look so crisp and clean
I'm amazed a studio i never heard of did such a fantastic job remastering two adult films but, Twilight Times can release Night of the Living Dead (1990) with the wrong color correction and charge $29.99 plus s&h and they get away with it!
This blu ray is just amazing and a must own This is the only blu ray i could find selling on amazon
I hope they do more or at least this one time release  starts a trend for other disturber to try and go in and re-release other classic adult films on blu ray as crazy as this sounds something like this could really help them make money (If they did it the proper way)

After the massive let down that's the so-called Limited edition of the Back to the Future blu ray box set was!  It's very strange and a little telling
That this a two pack of Retro/Classic adult films on a single blu ray in HD  runs circles around Universal Studios
Grab a copy while you can support this it's unique to say the least  10/10

Excellent re-master Blu-ray of two early 80's adult features.  Yes...ahem...adult...lol.
You can get this set on DVD but the Blu-ray is out of print from what I read.

The Young Like It Hot - incredible, my heart is pounding as I watch this, which doesnt happen as often as Id like with adult cinema (but if its well done and really gets me into the story as well as the action, its more likely to get those palpitations).  If I had known this was going to be this good I would have bought this a LONG time ago.  There are a lot of legends here (Hyapatia Lee, Kay Parker, Shauna Grant [credited here as Callie Aimes] nine gorgeous ladies in all) and they all look so sophisticated and attractive as they did back in those days. and the sheer amount of action is astounding.  The setting is an office, so everyone is dressed up for work but there is sex happening almost non-stop (many scenes overlap other scenes in different rooms) and under those elegant blouses and skirts there is a lot of beautiful lacy lingerie, nylon stockings and garter belts.  Lots of bush, lots of full-grown juicy labia and all the performances are top-notch and passionate.  Needless to say the quality is even more awesome thanks to Blu-ray but this 2-disc release came with the DVD as well.  But like I said, theres a real story and the kinds of performances vary according to the situation so theres no real formula or predictable blocking which makes it more exciting and natural somehow.  Theres even some POV, some girl-girl, tons of the usual explicit oral and vag penetration, with a little bit of anal too.  They even have mature action covered along with the younger girls. And Im happy to report, the A-B (repeat loop) and zoom functions on my player worked perfectly!  The scene with Kay Parker is the only place where the wood was a bit soft and brief but the scene with Shauna made up for it (her incredible pink, her cute touches of cellulite, her utter beauty and lovely flesh).  This movie has it all if you're into the old films, no question its one of the best films Ive ever seen.  Reminds me of how amazing the first Taboo was when I saw it originally its that good.

Hyapatia is back in the other movie too, Sweet Young Foxes, and she is just so utterly hot (by which I mean beautiful but also, really really into her performance, with nipples so puffy and full and an incredible turned on vag).  Not quite as many ladies or as much action but still some very well-done scenes and again, nice attention paid to things that help how exciting this is (story, costumes, nice sets, good acting, passion)  Great camera angles on this one as well as the other one - and the dudes are still in their prime (e.g. a young Ron Jeremy) and have a way of mostly presenting the womans anatomy to us while getting in there for their own enjoyment.  Amazing solo stuff with Kay Parker in this one, but her other scene is really hot as well.  There's a lot of nice shower footage of the other girls too.  And Im getting that rush of adrenaline again, from how good the action is and how passionate and intense it is it's erotic like a real movie with genuine sexuality.  Oh and btw, some INCREDIBLE SCENERY of the San Francisco Bay area!!
Perfect!!

Two very different movies from director Bob Chinn starring the breathtaking Hyapatia Lee. "Sweet Young Foxes " is a well done drama about a young girl (Hyapatia) yearning to get laid while her boyfriend is gone for the summer. (she gets her desires, having the majority of the sex scenes ). Shot on location,nicely written and well acted by the majority of the cast, it feels like a real movie .

"The Young Like It Hot" is a workplace sex farce. The late Shauna Grant shows a very good flair for comedy and is gorgeous to look at. Her one sex scene ignites the screen. Hyapatia has the most sex scenes of all the ladies and deservedly so. Her personality ,acting skills and beauty dominate every scene she is in in both movies. If you are curious about her singing voice, that is her performing the title song in "The Young Like It Hot."
